mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(total_hours), 0) FROM overtime WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} AND WEEK(date, 1) = WEEK(#{date}, 1)
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(night_hours), 0) FROM overtime WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} AND WEEK(date, 1) = WEEK(#{date}, 1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO overtime (employee_id, date, start_time, end_time, night_hours, total_hours) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{date}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{nightHours}, #{totalHours})
mapper.update: UPDATE overtime SET employee_id = #{employeeId}, date = #{date}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, night_hours = #{nightHours}, total_hours = #{totalHours} WHERE overtime_id = #{overtimeId}
